location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'PROPOSED RESERVATION OF 80FT. WIDE STRIP OF LAND FROM REFINERY TO SITRAH.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprint on tracing paperDimensions: 260 x 400mm, on sheet 270 x 420mm

mods.abstract: Blueprint sketch map produced by the Bahrain Petroleum Company, enclosed with a letter no. PA 333 (folio 26).Shows the easterly line of the refinery, including a central line representing intended road and pipelines from the refinery site to the Sitrah terminal, with distances and measurements. The letter contains a description of the land in question.
